description: Ask a bunch of permission without reason relate to application.
Love this app, I use this little tool almost everyday at my job.

I fiddled with this app for around 15+ minutes with no luck. It doesn't let you pick colors from your screen. Maybe it lets you pick color form within the app? That's not useful at all if so. If it does do what it says those who designed it should be fired...haha....
summary: Should say pick color only inside app, no screen. lol

description: Lovely little tool, Works perfect on ubuntu with X11
Works really well, love how the color picker scales up with the window size, and contrary to another review it does have a color picker feature that is very nice
Does not let you pick a color from the screen on ubuntu 22.04. Nothing happens.
It doesn't let you pick colors from your screen.
It does not allow you to pick colors from your screen.
